sentence.text: Identification of protein polyubiquitinationNAs related to metastasis enables us to obtain better insight into cancer development.

In the current study, we investigated the protein polyubiquitinationNA expressional profiles in the highly invasive human hepatocellular carcinoma cell line MHCC97-H and MHCC97-L with lower metastatic potential using miRNA microarrays.
protein polyubiquitination-26a, miR-548l and miR-34a, acting as tumor suppressors, may exert their effects by regulating ST3GAL5
